title: Run a Poll on Social Media
description: To engage the audience around a current event, a social media editor decides to run a poll.

tasks.description: Formulate a simple, clear question related to a current news story.
tasks.expected_outcome: A relevant poll question is drafted.

tasks.description: Provide 2-4 distinct and balanced answer options.
tasks.expected_outcome: A set of clear poll options is created.

tasks.description: Post the poll to Twitter or another suitable platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: The poll is live and collecting responses.

tasks.description: After the poll closes, share the results and a link to a related article.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engagement loop is closed by sharing the results.
